__e: How could I do that for a day, let alone for months?
How could I, what with me not talking and everything? !
Well... I... I don't know if... what...what could I do?
Could I please speak to the manager?
Could I speak to the man who came to my office earlier?
Now that I've got your attention, may I please speak with the owner?
May I speak to your father, please?
Could I, uh... speak to your friend or his contact?
May I speak to my daughter?
Could I speak to the man who came to my office earlier?
Could I, uh... speak to your friend or his contact?
Can i... talk to her for a minute?
I can't trust you now. And I can't trust who you will become in ten years.
How can I tell you the truth when I don't even know what you're talking about?
Look how small I am, and how big you are How could I do you any harm?
Could I speak with you for just a second?
Could I talk to you two guys for a second?
May I have a word, please?
Lieutenant, how can I ever thank you ?
Well, from what I remember, that was the night you said, "how can I ever repay you?"
How can I ever thank you?
I know it's late and I know I gave you kind of rough time today, but is there any way I can get you to come down to police headquarters?
If you know what I'm saying when I'm not saying anything, what do you need me for?
How can I give you an answer? If I give you an answer, I know it'll be a lot harder than now.
Unless it wouldn't be too much trouble could I get a glass of milk?
Could I have some room, please? Some room?
Yeah, can I have a few more moments of your time right now?
One moment, please. Can we have some silence?
Hey, everybody, uh, could I have your attention for just a second ?
Excuse me, can I have your attention, please?
Excuse me, can I have your attention, please?
How would I have any other boyfriends with you breathing down my neck?
Yeah, can I have a few more moments of your time right now?
How can I be friends with her when she is always trying to get in between us?
How could I be your father after what I had done?
How could I be a good mother to a child I don't want?
